verses.text: Eternal Spirit, source of truth, Our contrite hearts inspire; Revive the flame of heavenly love, And feed the pure desire.
Subdue the power of every sin, Whate'er that sin may be, And, soothe the sorrow of the trouble mind, And set the captive free.
Then our our spirits witness bear That we are sons of God, Redeemed from sin, from death and hell, Through our Redeemer's blood.
